Job Title: HVAC Technicians / Installers - Capital Heat

Location: Buffalo, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
2975 Walden Ave., Depew, NY 14043

HVAC Techs and Installers

Pay Ranges: $17 - $38 per hour Depending on Position and Experience + Great Benefits!

Experience Required

At Capital Heat our team is our most important asset, and we’re always looking for quality employees to strengthen our experience. If you are interested in joining our team as a Service Tech, Maintenance Tech, Lead Installer, or Installation Helper, please apply online today!

We offer:

Hourly pay ranges: Service Tech: $25 - $38 Maintenance Tech: $20 - $25 Lead Installer: $21 - $28 Installation Helper: $17 - $21 Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance401(k)PTO (Paid time off)We are proudly providing all of our techs with top training and supportCareer advancement opportunities 


Maintenance Techs need to possess the following attributes:

HVAC Maintenance ExperienceDependabilityProfessionalismEffective communication skillsPerform basic service callAbility to Work IndependentlyAbility to replace bad or faulty partsPerform proper maintenance on furnaces, boilers, air conditioners, heat pumps, water heaters and generatorsAbility to communicate with company phoneAbility to use company van, company phone and iPad 


Service Techs need to possess the following attributes:

HVAC Service ExperienceDependabilityProfessionalismEffective communication skillsAbility to Work IndependentlyAbility to perform diagnostic calls on furnaces, boilers, air conditioners, ductless systems, water heaters and generatorsAbility to repair and/or replace faulty partsKnowledge of geothermal systems a plusWork On-call shiftsAbility to use company van, company phone and iPad 


Job Description - Lead Installer:

Establish and manage the relationship with the customer during the residential installation process in a courteous, professional mannerDependability is necessaryAbility to professionally install the following equipment: furnace, air conditioner, heat pumps, boilers, water heaters and generatorsAbility to test systems after installations is requiredExplain the operation of the newly installed HVAC system to the customerAbility to communicate with company phone 


Job Description - Installation Helper:

Manage the relationship established between Sales and the customer during the residential installation process. Assist the Crew Leader on Installations as directedContinue to learn all aspects of the installation process from Installation Leader. Develop all Installation skills pertaining to Capital Heats product offering. Learn how to operate all equipment small or large based on Capital Heats product offering. 


Qualifications/Requirements:

Experience required and preferred for Installation HelperPossess effective verbal and written communication skillsExcellent problem-solving and customer service skillsMust have an honest and dependable personalityStrong mechanical aptitudeStrong ability to distinguish between various HVAC equipmentSelf-motivated individual with strong ability to follow instructions and work alone, as well as work effectively within a teamMust have a valid driver’s licensePlease upload your resume and complete the online assessmentMust be authorized to work in the U.S. without sponsorship and be a current resident. Must pass pre-employment testing to include background checks, MVR, and drug screening. 


About us:

Since 1957, Capital Heat has been delivering unmatched value and peace of mind to WNY homeowners, using our unrivaled expertise, leading technologies, and commitment to true service to give you the results you need with the care you deserve.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants considered regardless of ethnicity, nationality, gender, veteran or disability status, religion, age, gender orientation or other protected status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
